mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_photos (contest_id, user_id, photo_url, title, description, is_approved) VALUES (#{contestId}, #{userId}, #{photoUrl}, #{title}, #{description}, FALSE)
mapper.select: SELECT p.id AS photoId, p.title, u.username, u.id AS userId, p.photo_url AS photoUrl, p.total_votes AS totalVotes, p.submission_date AS submissionDate FROM user_photos p JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.id JOIN contests c ON p.contest_id = c.id WHERE p.contest_id = #{contestId} AND c.removed_at IS NULL ORDER BY p.total_votes DESC, p.submission_date ASC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_photos p JOIN contests c ON p.contest_id = c.id WHERE p.contest_id = #{contestId} AND c.removed_at IS NULL
SELECT p.* FROM user_photos p JOIN contests c ON p.contest_id = c.id WHERE p.id = #{photoId} AND c.removed_at IS NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE user_photos p SET total_votes = p.total_votes + 1, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM contests c WHERE p.id = #{photoId} AND p.contest_id = c.id AND c.removed_at IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.total_votes, p.submission_date FROM user_photos p JOIN contests c ON p.contest_id = c.id WHERE p.contest_id = #{contestId} AND c.removed_at IS NULL ORDER BY total_votes DESC, submission_date ASC

SELECT p.id, p.contest_id, p.user_id, p.photo_url, p.submission_date, p.total_votes, p.is_approved FROM user_photos p JOIN contests c ON p.contest_id = c.id WHERE p.id = #{photoId} AND c.removed_at IS NULL
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM user_photos p USING contests c WHERE p.id = #{photoId} AND p.contest_id = c.id AND c.removed_at IS NULL
